title: Killer's Kiss
description: Kiss life good-bye....Delia and Karina have always been rivals. For the best grades, the most friends, the hottest guys. This year, they both want Vincent--the most popular boy at Shadyside High.Karina is determined to win--no matter what it takes. And if she can't have Vincent, she'll make sure that no one can.Cover art by Bill Schmidt
author: R.L. Stine
